name: AVAudioMixInputParameters
desc: An object that represents the parameters that you apply when adding an audio track to a mix.

items.name: var trackID: CMPersistentTrackID
items.desc: The identifier of the audio track to which the parameters should be applied.

items.name: func getVolumeRamp(for: CMTime, startVolume: UnsafeMutablePointer<Float>?, endVolume: UnsafeMutablePointer<Float>?, timeRange: UnsafeMutablePointer<CMTimeRange>?) -> Bool
items.desc: Retrieves the volume ramp that includes the specified time.

items.name: var audioTapProcessor: MTAudioProcessingTap?
items.desc: The audio processing tap associated with the track.

items.name: var audioTimePitchAlgorithm: AVAudioTimePitchAlgorithm?
items.desc: The processing algorithm used to manage audio pitch for scaled audio edits.

items.name: struct AVAudioTimePitchAlgorithm
items.desc: An algorithm used to set the audio pitch as the rate changes.
